      • createBooking

        public Booking createBooking​(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String contact,
                             java.lang.String email,
                             int age,
                             ShowTimeItems showTimeItem,
                             java.lang.String[] seatStringArray,
                             double ticketprice,
                             double totalprice,
                             PaymentType paymentmethod)
        Create new booking and store inside booking list
        Parameters:
        name - Name of user
        contact - Contact number of user
        email - Email of user
        age - Age of user
        showTimeItem - Show time details
        seatStringArray - Array of all the seat positions
        ticketprice - Price for a single ticket
        totalprice - Total price for all tickets including GST
        paymentmethod - Payment method selected by user
        Returns:
        Returns booking entry as a Booking object

      • getBooking

        Parameters:
        bookingID - Booking Identification
        Returns:

      • checkBooking

        public boolean checkBooking​(java.lang.String date,
                            java.lang.String cineplex,
                            java.lang.String cinema,
                            java.lang.String time,
                            java.lang.String seatID)
        Check if booking exists
        Parameters:
        date - Date of booking
        cineplex - Cineplex name
        cinema - Cinema name
        time - Time of booking
        seatID - Seat Identification
        Returns:
        Returns TRUE if booking exist otherwise FALSE
